text: Viva Piñata is an animated television series. Released in 2006. based on the Xbox video game of the same name. ==Main Characters== Hudson Horstachio, a horse piñata with a green teal body. Franklin Flizzybear, a brown bear. Fergy Fudgehog, a green hedgehog. Paulie Pretzetail, a red fox with a pretzel-tail. Category:2006 television series debuts Category:2009 Canadian television series endings
title: Viva Piñata
